reviewText:
Jack Anderson has a wonderful take on J. Edgar Hoover.
Anderson knew Hoover well and liked him.
The evolution of their friendship into active dislike --if not contempt-- is the story you have to see here.
This video is a worthy part of an American History library.
This was the History Channel TV show.  It was boring. See it on television for free.  Wasn't worth the $22 I paid for it.
